trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Pueblo
There were no other sightings in Pueblo on or around April 3rd 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsmy fiance my mom and i were downtown by the river walk and in the sky i spotted a very bright light and it shot down a beam of light so i got my moms and fiances attention and we watched these disc shaped balls of light beam down light that reached the ground they would appear and disapear and re-appear i would say there were 4 or 5 of them the sighting reminded me of the phonix lights but more intense because of the beams of light they shot down this is the second time this year i have reported a ufo but this is just more unexplainable than the last experiance.....the crazy thing is that i had a dream just like this event occur just a week ago now i have more unanswered questions that i wish i could answer the sighting made me feel extremely enlighted and very happy,i am also kind of wondering if this has to do with the recent cow mutilations here in colorado?
Summary: Large disc, sphere shaped balls of light with beaming lights.
